subject: Ice Skating
lead_paragraph: Isabelle Delobel and Olivier Schoenfelder of France won the ice dance title at the World Figure Skating Championships in Goteborg, Sweden, and the Americans Tanith Belbin and Ben Agosto went home without a medal for the first time since 2004.Delobel and Schoenfelder failed to win the free dance, but they had built a big lead in the compulsories and the original dance. Tessa Virtue and Scott Moir of Canada got the silver medal, while Jana Khokhlova and Sergei Novitski of Russia won the bronze, edging Belbin and Agosto by 0.26 points. Belbin and Agosto, the Olympic silver medalists, had a rare fall in the compulsories.
